description:
The present game Raccoon invented is going on all over the forest. Everyone is looking for people to give presents to. Raccoon is feeling satisfied, but Wolverine doesn`t seem to be enjoying it. Fishing Cat runs away as soon as he sees Raccoon. What do they have against this fun game? While Raccoon ponders that, Wolverine`s father comes by, and he looks angry.
Source: crunchyroll
